website_summaries.verdict: A set of 3 cereal dispensers that are heavy duty, easy to fill, and easy to use.
pros: Rubber seal on this product helps keep your cereal fresh
Lid comes off easily for refilling
cons: The cereal can stay fresh in this container for a few weeks, but will begin to stale after that time

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have many OXO pop containers that I LOVE however I’m not a fan of these. The lid leaves a gap which lets air in. I’m pretty sure that defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Meka S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cereal Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Love the design, the crystal clear container and the lid. Easy one-handed use. Our favorite cereal is not carried by the grocery closest to us, so we usually buy two boxes when we find it. I poured two brand new boxes (16oz + 16oz) of the cereal into this container and there was still room to spare (see photo.)
customer_reviews.author: Zoosopher

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I purchased this container
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but after having cereal in this container for over a month, just as fresh as the day it came out of the box, I am glad I purchased this container! It holds a full box of my favorite cereal,18.7 ounces, and kept it fresh and crunchy for a month+... Usually after a couple of weeks in the box we had to throw cereal away as we do not eat a ton of it... Easy to clean, take apart & put back together! I see more OXO containers in my future! Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Eller

customer_reviews.title: My Boys Actually Complimented These!
customer_reviews.text: If you buy family size cereals, you need this size container. We love these, even though they're so expensive for what they are and I felt silly buying three of them. When my kids got home though, they raved about the containers (seriously!) and said the pantry looked so nice and they liked using them a lot more. I guess if a container can get young boys to even comment on it, it's doing something right? And they really are easy to pour and load so... yeah. Actually not a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 8 and she can serve her own cereal with these without making a mess and ruining cereals by leaving open the bags. My pantry looks great with them too, I’m a bit obsessed with OXO containers!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug818

customer_reviews.title: NOT AIR TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: My cereal lasted longer in the knock off version of this container. It isn't air tight as advertised. Wish I hadn't purchased this item. Now it is past my return date.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh Persaud

customer_reviews.title: Not Airtight
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my snap ware containers with some OXO airtight containers. I already have some containers for coffee and wanted something for cereal. These are not airtight though. When the lif is closed there is still a gap. I returned these and got the regular OXO pop cotainers. Much happier with those.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I love OXO brand items so purchased several different containers
customer_reviews.text: We recently had some problems with bugs in our pantry. I love OXO brand items so purchased several different containers. This one for Cereal is great and holds a small box of Cheerios easily. These are pretty well made too so I'm sure we will have them for years to come. Also eliminates my son from leaving the package open which leads to spoiled cereals.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best whim purchase in a while!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one on a whim at the grocery store to see if it would work for my kitty kibble (we don't eat ceareal in our house). I needed something reasonably small/light that my arthritic hands can handle but that was still air tight and held the fresh goodness smell for the cats. It takes two to hold the 8lbs of kibble so I ordered the second one from Amazon after I found that it fit the bill perfectly. Easy to pop open, pour and tap shut again and the cats aren't turning up their nose even by the time I get to the bottom of the second container.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette C. Dollar

customer_reviews.title: Holds 12.8 oz perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cereal fresh and I like that. Also, when I make my shopping list, I don't have to lift the box to figure out how much cereal is left. I just look. They hold a 12.8 oz cereal box perfectly. I get Millville Rice Squares from Aldi and they are a perfect fit. I really like these. If I were to do it over, I think I would get coupons for Bed Bath and Beyond and get the containers there.
customer_reviews.author: BrendaA.

customer_reviews.title: Mini 3 Pack
customer_reviews.text: The mini three pack is good for crackers, nuts, dried fruit, etc. All three are too small to hold cereal - even the smallest cereal boxes we had did not fit inside the largest container in the set. They are also not air-tight-enough to hold flours or other things that will be stored long term. These are best for things you eat regularly and can pour out the spout opening (so larger crackers would not work).
customer_reviews.author: ScotFlowerTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Shattered into a million pieces
customer_reviews.text: I dropped this container on the floor ONCE (not from that far up) and it shattered and made a huge mess. NOT happy! Of course it's past the return period. Wish the top stayed on better too!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Making my (dog’s) life better...
customer_reviews.text: We’re using this for our dog’s food. Replaced a Rubbermaid 1.5 gallon we had used for a decade. The spout hinge broken and the lid was a pain to open and close. This OXO looks cleaner - the frosty Rubbermaid/Tupperware look is never ‘clean’ looking, ya know? OXO is Easy to open and close. Seals seems good. The dog has not complained about her food - and trust me - she would. So I think this was an awesome replacement for the 1.5 gallon Rubbermaid. A bit taller. And we’ll see if the rigid clear plastic can survive a decade. But I am happy today (and more important, so is the dog.)
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not airtight
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn’t seal and won’t keep food fresh or bugs out. The gap on the lid was so big, you could look through to the contents inside. Would give less than 1 star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good Design, But One Fatal Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The design where you pour is awesome, much better than any others. But, the way the whole top attaches to the bottom container is an issue. The gasket is much too loose of a fit. Which means that too much weight on the top when you pour, or if you happen to grab by the top portion, will cause the top to just pop off. And everything will just spill. Perhaps not all are as loose as the one I had, but even so, I can only see others becoming worn with use or cleaning and causing the same issue. Maybe if there was some other way of attachment, this would be a perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: exlibris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Container!
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers! They make it easy to see when we need to get more cereal and no more bag clipping to preserve the freshness. One thing I will mention is that if you purchase costco size cereal only one of the two bags will fit in the container. So you will still need to store the additional bag unless you buy multiple containers. We usually get two types of cereal so we got two containers. Cannot imagine getting 4 containers to store 2 types of cereal so we will just put them in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Marqz

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the cereal holders but love OxO products
customer_reviews.text: I hate these oxo cereal items. I have 4 large ones and 3 smaller ones. They do not keep cereal fresh and one fell off the bottom about 24” and broke. I can get past one breaking but the lack of keeping things from going stale is unacceptable. Going back to using baggies or just putting box in fridge as that works too. Oxo product looks great and pours good and if it did what it said of keeping things fresh it would be a home run but now it’s no more than a foul ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new house and really wanted a Pinterest pantry. I purchased these since they match perfectly with the food storage containers I purchased. I’m really happy I decided to get them. The wide mouth makes for easy dispensing even with cereal like frosted mini wheats. Pros: Wide mouth for easy pouring Easy opening Easy to clean Cons: Higher priced
customer_reviews.author: MeganFromLV

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and attractive to boot
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I love these containers enough to make up for the exorbitant price tag, but I do like them a whole lot. I read that another reviewer dealt with stickers and gross sticker residue on their containers. Mine arrived with no stickers at all on the dispensers, so that was a happy surprise. I really love the shape and the grip. (Oh, shoot, is that why they're called "good grips"? That makes a lot of sense.) They're so easy to pick up. They've definitely made an OXO customer out of me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Buy! You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: PROS: These are great for storing cereal. They seal wall and look good in the pantry. I used a clear label on them to finish the look. CONS: Because of the material it is made of it will crack if dropped on tile; heads up for those with young kids. The silicone seal is dishwasher safe but the rest needs to be disassembled and washed by hand (not difficult but something to consider. I would definitely recommend to others & would buy them again. Hope this helps someone out there.
customer_reviews.author: Batman X

customer_reviews.title: Coolness
customer_reviews.text: I love the cereal boxes they’re freaking awesome to make the cereal look even more enticing my kids actually ate this cereal because they saw them in the school containers and the cereal had been there for days and nobody wanted to eat them and now they’ve been eating cereal LOL they’re pretty cool I just have to remember to close the lid and the material looks 30 but if you drop it it will crack so we have to be careful with them and really take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi Avila

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and keeps cereal fresh.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size for storing cereal. It's easy to pop open and pour out what ever is inside. The seal is tight and the container keeps food fresh. The container is 100% transparent and looks good enough you can keep it on the counter top or on an open shelf. The slim design makes it space efficient. I look one star of on the "easy to clean" rating because only the silicone gasket is dishwasher safe and rest of the product has to be washed by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P. :star:

customer_reviews.title: DONT LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE WHO SAY THERE IS A GAP
customer_reviews.text: DONT LISTEN TO THESE NOT SO SMART PEOPLE WHO SAY THERE IS A GAP. THERE IS A GAP THAT IS SEALED WITH A GASKET. SO IT MAY LOOL LIKE LIGHT IS GETTING THROUGH BUT NO AIR OR WATER CAN ITS AIRTIGHT. SOME PEOPLE ARE JUST NOT SMART
customer_reviews.author: Sgt M

customer_reviews.title: Use your palm!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these in the mail, but was really disappointed when I tried to open them, they are not easy open with just pushing with your fingers. My husband thought the same thing but he discovered if you use the palm of your hand they open really easy
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with all the oxo sealed containers, this cereal one made the cereal stale within a few days, and the box ones made cookies dry and stale within 3 days. better off leaving cereal in its plastic bag and cookies on their foil bag
customer_reviews.author: sergio garza

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been very happy with these dispensers. They keep my pantry neat looking. Only wish is that they were a little bit bigger, or offered a larger size, for those family size cereal boxes, but they’re still great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cereal Storage Containers You Can Find!
customer_reviews.text: Super air-tight. Ultra-large pour spout for most any size cereal. Look no further, just buy these. All others have openings that are too small for mini-wheats and even smaller cereals. My only teeny complaint is that they're tapered, which wastes a tiny amount of space that could be used by more cereal, but the medium size holds an entire family-sized box, so who cares? So glad I saw these on a sitcom recently and found them on Amazon. Yes, a bit pricey, but in this case, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Hands Of Gold

customer_reviews.title: Best things ever
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for keeping your foods organized and preventing them from going stale. I keep one if coffee and one with cereal next to my coffee maker. They are slim and Easy to pour. Even my 5 year old can pour them without a spill. Love! Well worth the investment to save money on food that goes bad from being left open. No More chip clips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough...
customer_reviews.text: These containers are easy to use and so far cereal hasn’t gone stale. However, they do not hold the whole regular size box of cereal you buy at the store. If you’re making a product to be used for a specific purpose, it should fit/hold whatever that purpose is. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hirsack

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal
customer_reviews.text: It does not seal airtight. I had moths get in and then they multiplied. I bought this hoping to avoid this problem but I also put water and n it to see if it leaked out and it did. Really frustrated cause I need a product to keep the bugs out
customer_reviews.author: William Wilson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. Keeps food fresher than the boxes or bags can and great seal so nothing can get in and nothing can get out. You get more cereal out of your box because if you're like me I don't eat the cereal that falls in between the bag and the box and now I get more cereal out of my boxes when storing them in these containers! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chassidy Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and make bulk cereal much easier to deal with. Easy for kids to use but does take a slight learning curve because the cereal flows out nice and smooth so you may experience an overfilled bowl or 2.... while getting used to using the containers.
customer_reviews.author: MorTork

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks and ease of use but Lucky Charms doesn't!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and that the grandkids can pour cereal right out of them. Easy to clean. But when I put their Lucky Charms cereal in a cannister the marshmellows were no longer hard after a few days! They were squishy. So moisture is getting in there. Haven't noticed that with other cereals. Even tried another cannister....still the same. Will continue to use for ease, just won't put Lucky Charms in them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your cereal fresh!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a cereal killer! He can easily go through 3 boxes of cereal in a week all by himself. I really hate a messy pantry and these canisters cleaned up the mess. We like them so much we’ll be purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Burke

customer_reviews.title: I was unsure...
customer_reviews.text: I read the mixed reviews for this and I like the brand’s other products. I was disappointed in the freshness. It kept cereal fresh for a couple weeks but thought it would last longer. I still like to use them just realize I have to eat the cereal quicker!
customer_reviews.author: mmjpk2014

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Use Them for cereal. They are dishwasher safe so just on the dishwasher when I need to clean them. They’re super easy to use and keeps my cereal fresh. And they keep everything looking nice and neat as you can see in the picture. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: zachus

customer_reviews.title: Opening is funky
customer_reviews.text: Because of the placement of the hinge, the lid opens in the front and the back. When the container is tipped over to pour cereal from a full canister, then loose cereal may slip out from the back of the lid too. The container almost fits an entire family size box of Cheerios. It fits the entire box minus one large bowl of cereal. The containers survived the dishwasher very well. They look clean and are highly durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L.

customer_reviews.title: Clean. Stylish. Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed product. It’s sturdy and small enough for sizes of cereal I buy. We don’t eat cereal every day so we purchase the 12oz boxes. I find the typical cereal dispensers are way too big and leave a ton of empty space in the container after emptying a new box of cereal inside. This one holds a 12oz box of cereal perfectly. So, it allows for efficient use of space on our shelves and countertops.
customer_reviews.author: BlakMaskingTape

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand always good quality. I had to purchase these because we have an ant problem in my house every summer and they always get into our cereal. Problem solved with these containers! They hold a large amount of cereal in each one, I also use for oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Dweebcake

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: OXO makes great stuff and is worth the premium price. I already owned (2) 4.5 Cereal Containers and decided to order 2 more. These are the perfect sizes for those bulk size cereal boxes. The lid seal is tight to lock in freshness and the containers are a breeze to clean. I know there are a lot of products in this segment but I have to say OXO has a great product and backs it up with a great warranty that you'll likely never need.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Green

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Purchased these to put the granola I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased these to put the granola I buy from sprouts into a container instead of keeping it in the plastic bag you use to buy it in. Seems to be airtight and hopefully it'll keep it from getting stale so I can buy other flavors of granola at the same time for my breakfasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Lov!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this whole product line. I redid my whole pantry with these containers. They are a little pricey but well worth it. This will be the last set of storage containers I will ever buy so it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Clark

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend---
customer_reviews.text: Very nice containers!! They're very expensive, but worth the cost when in comparison to our last set. The style is undoubtedly attractive. Easy to clean. Effortless pouring. Terrific airtight seal. On this item--- you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Great storage containers
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set (I have two of the cereal set). Read the directions if the lid isn't fitting properly, some of them you have to adjust. These are great for popcorn, rice and steel cut oatmeal. It's nice that I can how much is left and for the kids to pour out of.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Work well so far
customer_reviews.text: The large cereal ones work well so far. We got 2 for airtight containers to keep out moths and pests. Just be aware that the large cereal size is bigger than you think- it’s really for the extra-large economy-sized cereal boxes. So if you never buy those, get a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy pour
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food fresh, good size. Be very careful with rice, the mouth is so wide when you pour the rice it misses the bowl and makes a mess. You can simply remove the lid for rice but everything else pours fine. Great size!
customer_reviews.author: shanika80

customer_reviews.title: No more ants in our cereal!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed in Oxo, and these are great products as well. We get tiny ants in our pantry and I constantly had to throw away our cereal. Try as they might, they cannot get into these containers. I actually watched them today, trying to breach the seal to no avail. Felt great to frustrate the little invaders. My only reasons for withholding a perfect 5-star across the board are the fact that they aren’t dishwasher safe and they do crack easily if dropped on a hard floor. Those two things aside, they are perfect. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Huston

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this containers , I prefer to pay the extra money and have something that is gone last. Great quality and my pantry looks clean and organized Thanks oxo for amazing products
customer_reviews.author: jaryany diaz

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The plastic materials used for this storage container is not suited for kitchen use. The plastic breaks, cracks and scraches upon any impact or friction. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and good seal but we'll see how long it lasts...
customer_reviews.text: This product is super convenient. I love the spout and the way the lid pops up. It seals well. I'm not sure if it's worth $20 though. The hinges of the lid are held to the frame by two 1/8 inch plastic pegs and equally flimsy looking mechanisms to recieve the peg. I probably wouldn't have bought it if I had known about the hinges, but it actually really is nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pants

customer_reviews.title: Get the containers...
customer_reviews.text: Love them, already using them for cereal...excellent purchase. They are clear...we applied reusable labels. The look good on the counter. We even bought the oxo dispenser...pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well...Oxo is usually right on with their products
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these now. Just the right size for a box of cereal. The top opens easily and container easy to clean. I like the way they look in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Product
customer_reviews.text: After I received my small container, I decided to order 2 more medium containers. One came damaged but Amazon replaced it with a new one in just couple days. They didn't even want to hassle me by returning the damaged item back. I love Amazon's customer service btw. When it comes to the OXO, I love this container as well. I also tested them with water. No, they don't leak. I have 11 more OXO small containers other than the cereal ones. I love the easiness to use and my organized pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Didem Y.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cereal from getting stale but lid isn't kid proof.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing Costco size boxes of cereal! I only wish the lid had a way of locking on so my kids can't pull it off and accidentally spill said Costco cereal all over the floor!
customer_reviews.author: JLSinSEA

customer_reviews.title: OXO iPerfect cereal dispenser! PS read instructions
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of bad reviews about gap in lid and there but if you read/follow the reassembly instructions there will not be a gap. This cereal dispenser is perfect and I will be ordering a other.
customer_reviews.author: MMAL87

customer_reviews.title: Great if you had pantry bugs issue
customer_reviews.text: We discovered our mother-in-law kept some pretty old flour in her pantry, and the flour bug issue was out of control. We bought these to keep cereal fresh and out of the reach of bugs, should there be any left after clean up. You can have cereal there for two weeks and it's still crunchy. Also, you can just remove the rubber around the lid to wash it up.
customer_reviews.author: AndiH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This container is just the perfect size to fit into kitchen cabinets. A real space saver. I use it for my cat's dry food. No smell and no mess.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vergeront

customer_reviews.title: Use for cat food.  Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: It smells fresh every time I open it up like a new bag of cat food. The cat seems to think it is working. lol I like how easy it is to refill her bowl.
customer_reviews.author: HerMan

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Love OXO and have the other containers but these were so weird to me. They didn’t open easily and it seemed like they would spill everywhere and wouldn’t keep things fresh? Idk I returned after opening
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: Lids have a horrible pink/lavender-ish hue instead of being white
customer_reviews.text: The instant I pulled them out of the box, I knew there was something off with the color of the lid. All images of the product shows it as very white. All the internet photos of beautiful organized pantries showing all the varieties of oxo containers show no difference in the white color. What I got was an ugly lavender tinted white plastic. I also ordered other oxo containers which looked perfectly fine. You can tell the color difference in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: JigglyPoof

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great container. It keeps the contents fresh and prevents staleness. I got it so my 4 year old could start pouring his own cereal for breakfast. The top is easy enough for him to open and the "handle" on the back makes it easy for him to grip the container and pour with control.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best cereal containers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cereal containers Ive ever bought. Easy to open and close. See the pictures for reference how much each container can hold.
customer_reviews.author: jays4life

customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, I use to have the Rubbermaid cereal keepers but they did not pour cereal well nor keep well. My children are able to easily pour the cereal themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers for my cereal. I buy regular sized boxes and occasionally a larger box of cereal, depending on the brand. Haven’t had any issues fitting them into the containers. Could probably fit 2 smaller boxes of Special K cereal in 1. It seals well so my cereal stays fresh for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but functional
customer_reviews.text: This container works, keeps my chips/dry goods fresh longer for sure. The only downside it is fragile enough and even when slips and falls a shelf below it will crack. These are not cheap container and they break easily and for this reason I did not give it a 4 or 5 star
customer_reviews.author: BMD

customer_reviews.title: Great Containers!!
customer_reviews.text: Great containers! Easy to pour, lid doesn't fall off, and keeps bugs and moisture out!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pour, but cereal went stale
customer_reviews.text: I'd return these if it wasn't too much of a hassle because I live abroad. Fresh cereal in all 3 containers went stale after a couple of weeks. I'll probably end up getting the long original pop containers for the cereal.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cereal fresh and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my pantry organized and looking good and keeps my cereal fresh! I live in a humid area near the beach so without these my cereal would get stale too quickly. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to be careful
customer_reviews.text: I've been very gentle with them since I've heard that they will crack easily. The plastic doesn't seem very thick and it scratches very easily, even with light washing (unsightly on the clean plastic), but easy to take apart and clean. They are nice on the countertop and for decor but I'm pretty clumsy so I have to be extra careful with them since they aren't as durable as I thought they were.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using these for my cereal and rice at this time. I don't have a sue for the 3rd one yet but it is nice to have it as a stand by.
customer_reviews.author: David Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not air tight
customer_reviews.text: Lid was not easy to put on. There is still a gap when the lid is on . Rubbermaid keeps things fresher. Too late for me to return I destroyed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, keeps food fresh.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cereal, crackers, snacks, etc. Easy to keep at hand, stays fresh, and fits in standard kitchen pantries well, especially with other containers from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Summers

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed. 100% pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This storage container is just what I wanted. It holds the large box of cereal and keeps it as fresh as the day I opened the box. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay and Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but small.
customer_reviews.text: I love these for cereal storage. Makes it easier for my kids to keep the pantry neat instead of having bags of cereal all lumped together. Knocked off a star because they’re a bit smaller than I’d like.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best storage containers I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I will have to say these are the best food containers I have ever bought. I bought them for my cat food they stay sealed up perfectly they pour out great. They are very well built and sturdy. I will never buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: ✨They’re great for cereal!✨
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! I hated keeping the cereal in boxes. This way I know how much is left and it looks so much neater!
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% airtight.
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this a great review but after using it I’ve come to realize the seal is t so great. Definitely not airtight and for the price for one container I was hoping it would be nothing short of great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Weidenborner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive but worth the cost. Look nice and easy to use and clean. Only downside is that it won’t fit the Costco size bags of cereal. Still giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for our cereal in our camper. Very impressed. I am planning to buy two more for home.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pour, thick plastic, freshness
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Thick plastic and really easy open and close tab. Keeps stuff super fresh and easy to pour
customer_reviews.author: Rangerfan25

customer_reviews.title: Love these containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these easy poor containers. I really like the low profile of this size for a small box of cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOMENESS all around!! I purchase organic cereal that come in smaller cereal boxes. I'm able to fit two boxes per container. LOVE these! Such a great addition to my ever-growing organized pantry :)

customer_reviews.title: cereal dispenser 3.4qt
customer_reviews.text: prompt delivery, as described. very nicely made, easy to use, and holds a good size box of cereal. thanks

customer_reviews.title: Air tight  / well made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small boxes. Love the shape and ease of use. Has solved my almost empty boxes and enables variety while keeping it fresh.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Does not make it stay very fresh but holds a family size box of cereal
customer_reviews.author: Wave and Dwayne Milewski

customer_reviews.title: Love OXXO!!
customer_reviews.text: Love OXXO products. They did their job and look nice. Not cheap. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cereal very fresh! Easy to open... my 5 year old has no problem opening and closing it to pour herself some cereal 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not the best material.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. I bought 2 of these large and a medium cereal containers. One of the large ones arrived with a big star shaped crakck. Had to return it. They seem to be easily breakable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Organized and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything organized in my small pantry. I have four, and I’m glad I bought them. Can pour out cereal quickly, so be careful. Good way to show kids independence and organization.
customer_reviews.author: Missy24

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OXO is by far the best food containers. I use these for my clients.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and freshness
customer_reviews.text: These containers meet or exceed their expectations. They are easy to clean and also keep their contents fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn A. Souder

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing food
customer_reviews.text: This is great for storing cereal. I needed something that sealed and I had heard good things about the OXO brand. I am not disappointed and will be ordering more of their containers for food storage use
customer_reviews.author: Abby coomes

customer_reviews.title: Great Seal!
customer_reviews.text: At first when I first got this and unboxed it, I thought the deal was pretty loose and it wouldn’t keep my cereal fresh. HOWEVER... it isn’t what so ever! This keeps my cereal completely fresh for a RIDICULOUS amount of time.

customer_reviews.title: oxo products great!!
customer_reviews.text: Good sized--large. Going to use to store bird seed. Oxo products are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needs them to keep food in the pantry from attracting bugs. They arrived same day, in perfect condition. They have a great rubber seal and so far, no bugs. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Like them very much
customer_reviews.text: Like them very much. My only negative, they are a bit too fat, at least for my hands which are "normal." That said, great for cereal, which is my use.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not super air tight
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely on my shelf but it isn't super air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Savy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Must have with kids!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. My boys always leave the cereal boxes open and the cereal gets stale quickly. This is easy to pour and easy to close.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pantry. I wish they weren’t so expensive because I would love to have more

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The top doesn’t pop open as easy as other cereal containers so it’s easy for adults to open but keeps the toddler out which is much needed in my house. And it looks great in my pantry! I purchased 3!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie West

product_meta.title: OXO Good Grips 3-Piece Airtight POP Cereal Dispenser Set,Clear,3 Piece Cereal Set
product_meta.description: Size:3 Piece Cereal Set| Style Name:DispenserThe OXO Good Grips POP Cereal Dispensing Containers are airtight and space-efficient, making it easy to keep your cereal, granola and snacks fresh and your kitchen organized. The Containers have a unique pop-open lid for one-handed opening and closing that creates an airtight seal with just one touch. The contoured Container is comfortable to hold, even when the Container is full and the round opening is shaped for even, controlled pouring. The narrow shape is perfect for storing on countertops or in cabinets and is also great for other dry foods like flour, rice and more. The lid is easy to remove for cleaning or refilling and the lids are interchangeable between sizes. All POP Containers are BPA free.
feature_bullets: Set includes three 3.4 quart POP Cereal Dispensers
Silicone seal keeps cereal, granola and other snacks fresh
Smooth pour spout offers controlled, mess free dispensing
Contoured container is comfortable to hold, even when full
Designed for smart storage on countertops and in cabinets

The OXO Better Guarantee: If you experience an issue with your OXO product, get in touch with us for a repair or replacement. We’re grateful for the opportunity to learn from your experience, and we’ll make it better
